turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey John can you pick up a coffee for me at Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on campus at Valpo

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one by the student union ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the one by the libaray

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I forgot there were 2 locations

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have you put in an order ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I was going to have you order for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what can I get for you ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A flat white, skinny with an extra shot of espresso

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I think that’s all, get yourself something if you want it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thanks boss.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually get me a double shot of espresso I’ve got a lot to do

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Dang, okay boss you got it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks John. Appreciate the help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem boss

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you when you’re back at the office

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, bye
